details: User can order ring, delete own orders and admin can manage orders, add new products, Single Page Application and private routing,  Admin: admin@admin.com, Password:123456, Technology used: React Route, MongoDb, React Bootstrap, Firebase Deploy, Heroku Deploy

User can see various food types, order as a merchant and manage own orders, Dynamic API, CRUD operation implementation, secure firebase configuration, Technology used: Mapbox, REACT Route, React Bootstrap, Firebase Heroku, MongoDb

User can login and register(toggle), use google sign in system to see services details, User appointment form, SPA, dynamic services display, organized and responsive UI, Technology used: Html, CSS, REACT Route, Firebase, Bootstrap
